conbody.p: MapRprerequisitesDue to licensing restrictions, StreamSets cannot distribute MapR libraries with . As a result, you must perform additional steps to enable the machine to process MapR data.
To process data from a MapR cluster, install the on a node in the cluster or on a client machine. Before using to process MapR data, perform the following steps:

ol.li: In the configuration file, $SDC_CONF/sdc.properties, remove the MapR stage library that you want to use from the system.stagelibs.blacklist property.You can use one version of the MapR library at a time.

Create the following symlinks:
$MAPR_HOME/lib/* to $SDC_DIST/streamsets-libs/<MapR library>/lib/.
$MAPR_HOME is usually /opt/mapr.
<MapR library> is the name of the MapR library to use.
$MAPR_HOME/lib/maprfs-5.1.0-mapr-SNAPSHOT.jar to $SDC_DIST/root-lib/
